name: WordXing
description:
WordXing™ is the fast-paced word-crossing game for the iPhone and iPad. Players are given a set of letters to form into a single group of words that cross each other vertically and horizontally.

WordXing is exciting to play because:
• Intuitive interface makes game play easy and fast:
• Play new words by tapping each letter in sequence and then drag and drop the word onto the game board.
• Letters that have already been played can be rearranged to form different/better words.
• New letters can be requested and existing letters can be exchanged for new letters.
• WordXing accepts dictionary words as valid, but also accepts proper names, geographical names, abbreviations, slang, and pop-culture words.
• Double points are awarded for long words and words containing the special, “2X” letter chosen randomly at the start of the game.
• Play solo or against an opponent.
• The entire game is played in one turn. You never have to wait to play, even when playing an opponent.
• Concisely displays the pending games between you and your opponents.
• Tracks your best scores and every game played, enabling review of scores and final board layouts for you and your opponents.
• Two game types: time-limited and score-target games, each with short, medium, and long options.
• Play left or right handed - just rotate your device to find the best orientation for you.

WordXing supports 11 languages: Danish, Dutch, English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, and Turkish.

When you purchase WordXing, you get the app, the whole app, and nothing but the app! WordXing has no ads and no in-app purchases.
